articles.title: Aaron Boone may have cost Yankees their season with fateful Max Fried decision - New York Post
articles.description: Alex Cora entrusted his ace, Garrett Crochet, to throw a career-high 117 pitches. Aaron Boone pulled his ace, Max Fried, after 102.

articles.title: Napheesa Collier Torches WNBA: ‘Worst Leadership in the World’ - Front Office Sports
articles.description: Collier said commissioner Cathy Engelbert and the league office lack accountability, and are “tone-deaf” and “dismissive” toward players.

articles.title: Quick turnaround makes it tougher for Brock Purdy to play with toe injury on Thursday night - NBC Sports
49ers’ Mac Jones says what appears obvious: He, not Brock Purdy, will start vs. Rams - San Francisco Chronicle
articles.description: Niners QB Brock Purdy re-aggravated his toe injury in Sunday’s loss to Jacksonville. On a short week, San Francisco will likely turn to Mac Jones on Thursday.

articles.title: "Felt Like A Cartoon": Mohsin Naqvi Explains Asia Cup Trophy Act, BCCI Issues Warning - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Mohsin Naqvi, the Pakistan Cricket Board and Asian Cricket Council chief, said that he was made to look like a cartoon as he stood on the dais, waiting for the Indian team to collect the Asia Cup 2025 trophy.

articles.title: Ryder Cup emcee Heather McMahan breaks silence after ‘f–k you, Rory’ chant led to resignation - New York Post
articles.description: Rory McIlroy faced a barrage of jeers and over-the-line comments during the Ryder Cup at Bethpage Black on Long Island on Saturday and Sunday.

articles.title: BREAKING: UCLA agrees to part ways with important coach, shakes up staff - On3
Syracuse basketball great Moten dies at age 53 - ESPN
articles.description: Lawrence Moten, a basketball star at Syracuse in the early 1990s who still holds the program scoring record, has died. He was 53.

articles.title: Kuminga, Warriors agree on 2-year, $48M deal - ESPN
articles.description: Jonathan Kuminga and the Warriors ended a monthslong stalemate Tuesday, reaching agreement on a two-year deal worth $48.5 million.

articles.description: A group led by real estate developer Patrick Zalupski closed on its purchase of the Rays, finalizing the sale of the team from former owner Stuart Sternberg.

articles.description: The Guardians must win Wednesday, or their season is over.
